item.title: 'My wife died giving birth after Trump cut funding to our clinic'
item.description: The BBC hears devastating accounts of Afghan mothers and babies dying after US-backed clinics shut.

item.title: Final stage of Vuelta abandoned because of protests
item.description: The final stage of the Vuelta a Espana is abandoned after pro-Palestinian protesters enter the course in the centre of Madrid.

item.title: Kirk suspect 'not co-operating' with authorities, governor says
item.description: He adds that "much more evidence and information" will become available once charges are filed in the case.

item.title: Romania becomes second Nato country to report Russian drone in its airspace
item.description: Ukraine's President Zelensky called the incursion "an obvious expansion of the war by Russia".

item.title: Rubio in Israel as IDF destroys more Gaza City buildings
item.description: The US secretary of state will discuss the war in Gaza following Israel's attack on Hamas in Qatar, which has drawn widespread condemnation.
